title: File an Auto Claim (FNOL)
description: A policyholder calls to report a minor car accident (fender bender). This is the First Notice of Loss (FNOL).

tasks.description: Identify the policyholder and verify their policy is active.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer and their active auto policy.

tasks.description: Gather details about the accident: date, time, location, description of what happened, and information about the other party.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately captures all details of the loss event.

tasks.description: Create a new claim file, provide the customer with a claim number, and explain the next steps.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully initiates the claim, provides a claim number, and explains that an adjuster will be in contact.
